questions.question_text: A bookshop sells books at RM25 each. If they offer a 20% discount, how much would 3 books cost? Show your working.
questions.correct_answer: Discounted price = RM25 × 0.8 = RM20. Total = RM20 × 3 = RM60

questions.question_text: What is the area of a rectangle with length 8cm and width 5cm?
A circle has a radius of 7cm. Calculate its circumference using π = 22/7.
How many grams are in 2.5 kg?
A train travels at 80km/h. How far does it travel in 3 hours?
A triangle has angles of 60° and 80°. The third angle is _______ degrees.
What is the value of 2n when n = 6?
A train leaves at 09:45 and arrives at 11:20. How long is the journey?
How many minutes are in 2 hours 30 minutes?
Which type of chart is best for showing change over time?
The ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:2. If there are 15 boys, how many girls are there?
questions.correct_answer: Boys:Girls = 3:2. If 3 parts = 15, then 1 part = 5. Girls = 2 × 5 = 10

questions.question_text: A tank can hold 500 liters of water. It is 3/5 full. How many more liters are needed to fill it?
questions.correct_answer: Water in tank = 500 × 3/5 = 300L. Space remaining = 500 - 300 = 200 liters

questions.question_text: Calculate the area of a triangle with base 10cm and height 6cm. Show your working.
Find the median of: 2, 5, 8, 11, 14. The median is _______.
A book normally costs RM40. It is on sale for 25% off. Show your working to find the sale price.
questions.correct_answer: Discount = 25% of RM40 = RM10. Sale price = RM40 - RM10 = RM30
